---
title: Conference Report of Why R? Turkey 2021
abstract: The Why R? Turkey 2021 as a three-day online conference was organized to
  bring together researchers and professionals from Turkey on April 16-17-18, 2021.
  We hereby aimed to promote the R community in Turkey by bringing R users with different
  backgrounds such as genetics, sociology, finance, economy, bio-statistics. There
  were 8 thematic sessions and 18 invited speakers. In this article, it is aimed to
  describe the preparation phase, technical details, and the impact of the conference
  on audience.
